content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Guten Tag, Herr Müller. Welcome to our discussion. The apartment is in high demand due to its prime location in the city center. I believe a fair starting price would be 1000 Euro per month.
User
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I appreciate your perspective, but as a responsible student, I'm looking for a more affordable option. Could you consider a lower price, perhaps around 800 Euro per month?
Landlord
User
Max Müller: I understand that the location is convenient, but I'm on a tight budget. Is there any chance you could lower the price to 750 Euro per month? I promise to take good care of the apartment and be a responsible tenant.
Landlord
User
Max Müller: I really appreciate your consideration, but I think we might have different opinions on the apartment's value. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because it seems like we might not reach a mutually agreeable price.
Landlord
User
Max Müller: TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
